transArray.content: The bathroom in the room is separated from wet and dry. The makeup mirror also has a light-filling function. There is also a smart device in the room for conversation. The shampoo in the shower smells good, and the light fragrance is good! The windows are also very big and the service staff clean them very well.

Dear guests, thank you very much for your praise of our hotel, we will continue to do our best to live up to your praise. Thank you again for your affirmation of the hotel, look forward to visiting again, and wish you a pleasant journey!
